flawed_nl_solution:
There are (300/3) x 2 = 100 x 2 = <<300/3*2=20>>20 females cows in the field.
There are 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 male cows in the field.
20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 female cows are spotted.
10/2 = <<10/2=5>>5 male cows have horns.
There are 10 - 5 = <<10-5=5>>5 more females with spots than males with horns.
